name: Greedy Heroes (Jarp games)
description:
Pick one of two greedy heroes and go for an adventure in search of coins. After each level, you have to decide whether to return the coins to the bank or take them with you, it is always better to have a few pieces with you to unlock the slayer powerup and make it easier for you to fight your opponents! But at the end you need to save some money for John and Max.. Let's go!

Features:
- Two playable characters
(John moves quickly but fights opponents poorly, but Max can defeat them with one hit but is slow)
- 12 Procedural generated levels
( Caves, Forest, Ice and Fire)

Controls:
Arrows to move
G - Punch hit
F - Shoot

Hope you enjoy!
